name: Flappy Goose (Goose Creations)
description:
This game is somewhat of a clone of Flappy Bird. This game is my second game. Donations are gladly accepted through PayPal

VERSION 0.2A UPDATE:

- Added Fireworks

- Added Explosion Sounds

- Fixed UI Bug

- Able to Play On Mobile [Note: Mobile hasn't been optimized yet, there will be some UI bugs]

MUSIC:

Music is by my lifetime friend, Moose.

https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCOWdzX-R5NSuLBWCThWTq1A/featured

WARNING: DO NOT PLAY VISUALS QUALITY SETTING UNLESS YOU HAVE A DECENT DEVICE. ALSO DO NOT PLAY IN FULLSCREEN!

Next Update: August 2022.
